ygData.subject: Re: Ramblings While the Servers are Down
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, if you find yourself with too much stuff to carry around based on your lucky streak, I know a level 12 Ranger who wouldn t mind a few trinkets!
ygData.messageBody:
You know, if you find yourself with too much
stuff to carry around based on your lucky streak, I
know a level 12 Ranger who wouldn't mind a few
trinkets! LOL<br><br>A second note: I just started an
Erudite Enchanter (now level 3, goes by the name
Arrelna), who will potentially be a jewelry making machine
for my characters and anyone else who needs stuff (at
a nominal fee, or less for friends.) Anyone have
any ideas on powerleveling her and getting her some
quick cash so she can start buying those gems and
silver bars? As far as I can tell, I've got until level
8 to get my enchant spell for the metal, and only
five more practice points needed to get her jewelcraft
skill to 21, so I'll have some time to work on other
things before she starts making stuff. Let me know what
you all think.<br><br>Taniz (12 Ranger on Mithaniel
Marr)<br>a.k.a. (Arrelna 3 Enchanter)
